item.title: How to Use Tallow Balm as a Cleanser: A Natural Oil Cleansing Method
item.description: How to Use Tallow Balm as a Cleanser Tallow balm NZ isn’t just for moisturising—it’s also an excellent natural cleanser that removes dirt, excess oil, and even makeup without stripping the skin. 1. Why Use Tallow Balm as a Cleanser? ✔ Gently removes impurities → Dissolves dirt and makeup without harsh surfactants. ✔ Maintains skin’s natural oils → No tight, dry feeling after cleansing. ✔ Hydrates while cleansing → Leaves skin soft, not stripped.
